mapper.insert: insert into ck_member (mno, username, password, email, role, kor_name, phone) values (member_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role}, #{korName}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ck_member WHERE username = #{username}
select mno, username, password, email, phone, role, kor_name as korName, createDate from ck_member where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update ck_member set kor_name = #{korName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} where mno = #{mno}
